name: Aeste Code
body:
### Aeste:Code
Our code repository on github serves as a public repository for our product codes. The code available here can be forked and worked upon by the public. If there are any improvements, just send us a *pull request* to integrate the changes back into the main-line code.

### License
Most of our software code is released under the [GPL3](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html) license or better. Some of our hardware code is released under the [LGPL3](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl.html) or better.

### Git Flow
We use the popular 'git flow' workflow processes in-house. Actual code used in products can be found in the _master_ branch, while all development work happens on the _development_ branch. More information on the [process](http://www.atlassian.com/git/workflows#!workflow-gitflow).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
